title: Testing Python docs auto deploy
description:
Python project to create documentation files on Read the Docs and deploy it to Github releases and pages.

See .readthedocs.yml to see how to configure Read the Docs deployment

See .travis-ci.yml files to see how to tests and build the docs and deploy it to:

  • PyPI (test)
  • Github Releases
  • Github Pages
  • Zenodo DOI (sandbox)

Sphinx autobuild

Install:

$ pip install -r docs/requirements.txt

Start autobuild (with live reload):

$ make livehtml
